statements: SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'user' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, role FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email, role FROM users ORDER BY role ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_purchases > 2;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, age FROM users JOIN purchases ON users.user_id = purchases.user_id WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM purchases GROUP BY user_id HAVING avg_price > 50 ORDER BY avg_price DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_purchases >= 3 ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT user_id, pseudo_name FROM user_data WHERE birth_year > 1990 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_data ORDER BY pseudo_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT data_id, user_id, analysis_date FROM analytics_data WHERE data_value > 50 ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_data WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT pseudo_name, email FROM user_data WHERE birth_year = 1990;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM activity_logs WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(data_value) AS avg_data_value FROM analytics_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING AVG(data_value) > 50;

SELECT u.user_id, u.pseudo_name, a.action, ad.data_value FROM user_data u JOIN activity_logs a ON u.user_id = a.user_id JOIN analytics_data ad ON u.user_id = ad.user_id WHERE ad.analysis_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT user_id, username, email, age FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT username, email, age FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY email ASC
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price > 500 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT users.username, count(orders.order_id) AS total_orders FROM users JOIN orders ON users.user_id = orders.user_id GROUP BY users.username ORDER BY total_orders DESC

SELECT users.username, SUM(transactions.amount) AS total_amount FROM users JOIN orders ON users.user_id = orders.user_id JOIN transactions ON orders.order_id = transactions.order_id GROUP BY users.username ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM user_data
SELECT username, email, gender FROM user_data
SELECT purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM purchase_data
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_data
SELECT user_id, product_id, quantity FROM purchase_history
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT username, email FROM user_data WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, date_of_birth FROM user_data ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, purchase_amount FROM user_data JOIN purchase_data ON user_data.user_id = purchase_data.user_id;

SELECT user_id, product_name, category, price FROM user_data JOIN purchase_history ON user_data.user_id = purchase_history.user_id JOIN product_data ON purchase_history.product_id = product_data.product_id;
